plot: The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
title: "Mystery Science Theater 3000" Robot Monster
plot_es: The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
plot_en: The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.

cast.role: Crow T. Robot /              Dr. Clayton Forrester
cast.name: Trace Beaulieu
